cloptions

Class CLOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • cloptions.CLOptions

  • public class CLOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple utility for extracting command-line options from a list of arg strings.

    • Method Detail

      • options

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.regex.Matcher> options(java.util.List<java.lang.String> args,
                                                                              java.lang.String... patterns)
        Scan a list of command-line arguments and extract any recognised option flags.
        Parameters:
        args - the list of command-line arguments. All recognised flags will be removed from the list, so the list must support the remove operation (note that this means that the list cannot be created simply using Arrays.asList since this creates a list with immutable structure).
        patterns - the array of option patterns to look for. The patterns should be specified without leading hyphens; a string in the arg list will be matched if it matches one of the pattern strings with either a single "-" or double "--" added to the front. For example, both "-debug" and "--debug" will match the pattern "debug".
        Returns:
        a map mapping matched patterns to their final (rightmost) match without the leading hyphens.

      • basePath

        public static java.lang.String basePath(java.lang.String pathString)
        String representation of a given path string minus its extension.
        Parameters:
        pathString - the original path
        Returns:
        the path minus its final file name extension (or the original path if it doesn't end in a file name extension)
